main event: Several witnesses reported seeing an unidentified flying object in Northeast Harbor, Maine, which was described as emitting unusual lights and moving erratically.
interesting points: The UFO was described as stationary at times and moved rapidly out to sea before reappearing,The object emitted a blue-white light that increased in intensity,The sighting was reported by multiple residents including a Mother Superior and two nuns,Several witnesses noted the object seemed to be under intelligent control,Multiple reports have been documented in the area over time.
sighted object: one unidentified flying object emitting unusual lights
witness description: residents including a Mother Superior and nuns, a ranger, and other observers in the vicinity
